table.name: vtiger_agents
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_agents` (`agentsid` int(11) default NULL, `agentsno` varchar(100) default NULL, `agents_tks_name` varchar(16) default NULL ,`agents_tks_age` varchar(88) default NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`agentsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_agentscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_agentscf` (`agentsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`agentsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
